name: UpdateFileManagerFolder
description:
Update a specific File Manager folder in Mailchimp.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific folder in Mailchimp's File Manager. Useful for organizing files within the platform.

parameters.name: file_manager_folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the File Manager folder to update.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the File Manager folder.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The new name for the File Manager folder. It should be a string value.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the File Manager folder.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the File Manager folder.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
